item.title: Document Reporting Services (SSRS)
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide to SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) for creating and managing business documents and reports in Dynamics 365 Finance Operations.

item.title: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Commerce - Component Overview
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Visual overview of Microsoft Dynamics 365 Commerce architecture and component structure. Understand the key components and their relationships in the Commerce ecosystem.

item.title: Visual Studio Tips for Dynamics 365 Finance Operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Essential Visual Studio configuration tips for Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations development. Optimize your development environment with best practices, build settings, and custom toolbars.
